extendedInfo.description: Space War is Hell.A Retro-Vector Arcade Blaster with experimental support for anaglyphic 3D glasses.The inspiration and look is draw from early 80s arcade games and the sound was created on a classic Korg MS-10 mono synth but this is a 21st century game making full use of your devices 3d hardware, touch screen and motion sensors.So step up, Space Captain, there's a Space-War to win!If you'd like to follow the progress of SpaceWars and SpaceWarsDeluxe, visit:http://marblemad.tumblr.com/

reviews.title: Great tribute to classic arcade games
reviews.comment: Great fun, addictive and well put together. Can\'t wait for the full version!
reviews.author: Nathan Collins

reviews.title: This will be one of the very few games I am willing to pay for
reviews.comment: Great work. Love the 3d effect and retro sound. I agree that the auto zoom needs to be tweaked somehow..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Goes faster when thrust is off? I hate auto zoom.
reviews.comment: However, beautiful graphics, excellent sound, top levels, controls need lots of skill, noevil permissions or access. Please please kill the auto zoom.  PLEASE KILL THE AUTO ZOOM.  Or at least a kill zoom option.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I\'ll keep watching!
reviews.comment: I haven\'t even made it past the first level yet. The controls aren\'t perfect yet either. The wireframe action looks really good & the framerates are flying so far. The environment definitely needs more influence on the ships! (Hills with repellers to feel as if you are pushed downhill?) How about some walls? I\'m gonna keep playing & hoping for more to come!
reviews.author: Prophet Zarquon

reviews.title: Space Warz
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait for payed Deluxe 3D version. Any release date? One of the best if not best game I have seen for some time.
reviews.author: Ian Hare

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I was looking for a retro vector game and found it! This rocks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Like other games this does not work properly on tablet. Though the image is set to landscape, the tilt controls are still set to portrait and calibration doesnt really work, though on touch controls the game is great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love It
reviews.comment: A wonderful evolution of a classic!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Runs a bit slow on my underpowered zte san francisco but still a great blast !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: um, full version? yes this game rocks hard
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Forget glasses, please do glasses free for evo 3d and optimus 3d
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome demo. Smooth running, quality vector graphics. Can\'t wait for the full game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Anaglyph is cool feature can\'t wait for pay version. Please add SD move.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really enjoyed this. The controls have a steep learning curve but I eventually got the hang of it. The anaglyph 3d is super cool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Please change the controls, it really doesn\'t go well with the game. The gameplay is average. 3/5 rating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pretty awesome. Menu open issue on Nexus One 2.3
reviews.author: A Google User
